name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon
synopsis: When the imperiled Earth Federation battles the notorious Zeon Forces, which side will you be on? Mobile Suit Gundam: Federation vs. Zeon forces you to choose which army to lead in furious outer-space combat. Play more than 200 missions solo or share the screen with a friend for head-to-head or team battle action. Actual actors from the TV series provide full voice-overs in the game, immersing you in Mobile Suit Gundam world.
